deprecationBanner.title: This project is no longer being actively maintained
deprecationBanner.copy: The backend servers have been shut down. This instance is only showing fake exemplary data now. You can find more information about the overall project status on <0>isems.de</0>

nodeList.loadError: Could not load data. Make sure your device can reach the data collector.

timeOffset.noDataForDays: The module did not send data for {{days}} days.
timeOffset.sendingData: The module is sending data. The latest transmission was {{count}} {{unit}} ago.

batteryHealth.batteryLevelLow: The battery capacity level is low. It might need to be replaced.

charge.charging: The battery is charging. The current charge is approximately {{chargePercentage}}%.
charge.discharging: The battery is discharging. The current charge is approximately {{chargePercentage}}%.

batteryCapacity.lowBatteryCapacity: The battery does not hold enough charge. You might have to install a bigger one.

temperature.noTemperatureSensor: The battery temperature sensor is not connected. Connect it to make sure to get more information.
temperature.overheating: The battery is overheating ({{ batteryTemperature }} 째C). Try moving it to a cooler place or increasing ventilation.
temperature.tooCold: The battery is too cold ({{ batteryTemperature }} 째C). Ideally it should not be below -10째C. Try adding some isolation.
temperature.ok: The battery temperature is OK ({{batteryTemperature}} 째C).

solar_controller_communication.error: Cannot communicate with solar controller. Make sure the devices are properly connected.
solar_controller_communication.ok: Communication with solar controller successfully established

critical.heading: This message is considered critical.
critical.body: Due to this we can not reliably show you any other information about this node.
